synopsis.text: Glinda Knights' Origins: A Code Geass: Soubou no Oz picture drama unveils the intriguing events that led to the formation of the esteemed Glinda Knights. This compelling tale follows the lives of two individuals hailing from contrasting backgrounds: Orpheus Zevon, a young KMF theorist on a quest to find his mistress's murderer, and Oldrin Zevon, a protiteristick√© member of the British Empire's Glinda Knights unit. With evident inspiration drawn from the timeless classic, The Wizard of Oz, this captivating drama offers a fresh perspective on the Code Geass universe. The package includes bonus content such as Mask:0, Glinda Kishidan Souritsu, a bonus track, and insightful cast comments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
